tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vehicle_telemetry_data (
    vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR,
    speed FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    fuel_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_data (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR,
    speed FLOAT,
    mileage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sensor_type VARCHAR,
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicle_data(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE journey_data (
    journey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    driver_id INT,
    start_location VARCHAR,
    end_location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE telemetry_data (
   telemetry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_id INT,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   latitude FLOAT,
   longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE trip_data (
   trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   vehicle_id INT,
   start_time TIMESTAMP,
   end_time TIMESTAMP,
   distance FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name VARCHAR(255),
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    manufacture_year INT,
    last_telemetry_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE telemetry_data (
    telemetry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id),
    telemetry_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    speed FLOAT,
    location_lat FLOAT,
    location_long FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id),
    driver_id INT REFERENCES drivers(driver_id),
    assignment_date DATE,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
);
